display_name: Brief Index of Sleep Control: Total score
description:
Total from the Brief Index of Sleep Control (BRISC), computed by taking the mean of all 4 items, greater scores indicate more control (range of 0-4). [Gardner et al 2020 (PMID: 32482573)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/32482573/)

[Search for all Brief Index of Sleep Control (BRISC) variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/answers/variables?search=brisc)
